results.title: Diabetes-induced testicular oxidative stress, inflammation, and caspase-dependent apoptosis: the protective role of metformin.
results.text_hl: ...Context: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@'s effect on glycaemic control is well documented, but its effect on @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Testicular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013733 @@@testicular impairment@@@ has been scarcely reported.Objective: To investigate the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on testicular oxidative stress, @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, and apoptosis, which largely contribute to fertility decline in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ state.Methods: Male Sprague-Dawley @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were divided into 3 groups (n = 6/group) namely: normal control (NC), @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ control (DC), and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (300 mg/kg b.w.

citations.NLM: Nna VU, Bakar ABA, Ahmad A, Mohamed M. Diabetes-induced testicular oxidative stress, inflammation, and caspase-dependent apoptosis: the protective role of metformin. Arch Physiol Biochem. 2020 Dec;126(5):377-388. PMID: 30513216
citations.BibTeX: @article{30513216, title={Diabetes-induced testicular oxidative stress, inflammation, and caspase-dependent apoptosis: the protective role of metformin.}, author={Nna VU and Bakar ABA and Ahmad A and Mohamed M}, journal={Arch Physiol Biochem}, volume={126}, number={5}, pages={377-388}}

results.title: The therapeutic role of lactobacillus and montelukast in combination with metformin in diabetes mellitus complications through modulation of gut microbiota and suppression of oxidative stress.
results.text_hl: This study is designed to explore the therapeutic potential of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_montelukast @CHEMICAL_MESH:C093875 @@@montelukast@@@, in combination with Lactobacillus, for modulation of intestinal flora and suppression of oxidative stress in @<m>DISEASE_Testicular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013733 @@@testicular and liver damage@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ male @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
